solution_line_template: Aisha starts with {songs_first_week} songs + {songs_second_week} songs = <<{songs_first_week}+{songs_second_week}={songs_after_two_weeks}>>{songs_after_two_weeks} songs added to her mp3 player in the first two weeks.
After that Aisha adds twice that amount to her mp3 player, {songs_after_two_weeks} x {multiplier} = <<{songs_after_two_weeks}*{multiplier}={songs_added_after}>>{songs_added_after} songs added.
She now has {songs_after_two_weeks} + {songs_added_after} = <<{songs_after_two_weeks}+{songs_added_after}={total_songs_before_removal}>>{total_songs_before_removal} songs on her mp3 player.

However, she decides she wants to remove {songs_removed} of them, {total_songs_before_removal} - {songs_removed} = <<{total_songs_before_removal}-{songs_removed}={songs_now}>>{songs_now} songs on her mp3 player.
